titleInfo.title: All Star Rock and Roll Event

mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and red on white) announcing an All Star Rock and Roll Event featuring Smack Dab, Stratotanker, Railroad Jerk, and Cake Like at Westbeth Theatre Music Hall in New York, New York on June 1. Poster features several metal photoplates of heads.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
